trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for a page theme, which is a collection of resources that are used to define a consistent look across pages and controls in a Web site.
The page theme can be set through configuration or the page directive.
Page and control developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> classes directly.
trans-unit.target: Не используйте разработчики страниц и элементов управления <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin>, или <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> классы напрямую.

trans-unit.source: These classes are used by the ASP.NET parser and runtime to apply style sheet elements that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skins files to pages and specific types of controls.
trans-unit.target: Эти классы используются анализатором ASP.NET и среды выполнения для применения элементы таблицы стилей, которые определены в темах ASP.NET и файлы обложек элементов управления к страницам и определенным типам элементов управления.

trans-unit.source: Page developers enable (or disable) page themes using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Разработчики страниц включить (или отключить) темы страницы с помощью <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A> и <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> свойства.

trans-unit.source: For more information about page themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения о темах страниц см. в разделе [ASP.NET тем и обложек](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> class.
When overridden a derived class, gets the relative URL of the directory for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> object.
A string value containing the relative URL of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> directory.
trans-unit.target: Строковое значение, содержащее относительный URL-адрес <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> каталога.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property is abstract.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> Свойство является абстрактным.

trans-unit.source: When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: При компиляции темы формируется код, который переопределяет <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> свойство.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property to resolves a relative URL to an absolute URL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A> Использует метод <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> свойства разрешается относительный URL-адрес в абсолютный URL-адрес.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> interface of the names of all default skins that are available for the current page theme, indexed by control type.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the control skins associated with the current page theme.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> , Представляющий обложки элементов управления, связанных с текущей темы страницы.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.ControlSkins%2A> property is abstract.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.ControlSkins%2A> Свойство является абстрактным.

trans-unit.source: When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.
trans-unit.target: При компиляции темы формируется код, который переопределяет данное свойство.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of control to which a control skin applies, which is passed typically from the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType" />.
The name of the control skin for which to create a key.
Creates a lookup key object for a particular control type and skin ID.
An object that can be used as a lookup key in a dictionary-style collection, which contains the control type and skin ID information.
<paramref name="controlType" /> is <see langword="null" />.

Uses the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> control that the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> class is associated with to evaluate a data-binding expression.
The navigation path from the container to the public property value.
For details, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataBinder" />.

Uses the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval(System.Object,System.String)" /> method of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page" /> property that the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> class is associated with to evaluate a data-binding expression.
An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Eval%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the data item container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Eval%2A> Использует метод <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> методом устранения контейнера элемента данных.

trans-unit.source: The navigation path from the container to the public property value.
For details, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataBinder" />.
A .NET Framework format string.
For details, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataBinder" />.

Uses the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval(System.Object,System.String,System.String)" /> method of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page" /> property that the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> class is associated with to evaluate a data-binding expression.
A string that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Eval%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the data item container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Eval%2A> Использует метод <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> методом устранения контейнера элемента данных.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of style sheets that are linked to this page.
A string array of style sheets linked to this page.
trans-unit.target: Массив строк таблиц стилей, связанных с данной страницей.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.LinkedStyleSheets%2A> property is abstract and must be implemented in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.LinkedStyleSheets%2A> Свойство является абстрактным и должен быть реализован в производном классе.

trans-unit.source: When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.
trans-unit.target: При компиляции темы формируется код, который переопределяет данное свойство.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object that is associated with the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" />, связанный с объектом <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page%2A> property is read-only and is assigned internally when an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> class is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page%2A> Свойство доступно только для чтения и ему назначено внутренним образом при создании экземпляра <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> создается класс.

trans-unit.source: The string name of the device filter to check.
Tests whether a device filter applies to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> control that the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> class is associated with.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="deviceFilterName" /> applies to the page; otherwise; <see langword="false" />.
Provides support for parsing and evaluating an XPath data-binding expression in theme skin files.
The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder" />.
Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression.
An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding <paramref name="xPathExpression" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> Использует метод <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> методом устранения <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> ссылкой на объект, оценивается выражение.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder" />.
A .NET Framework format string to apply to the result.
Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression using the specified format string to display the result.
A string that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> Использует метод <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> методом устранения <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> ссылкой на объект, оценивается выражение.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder" />.
A set of prefix and namespace mappings used for namespace resolution.
Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression using the specified prefix and namespace mappings for namespace resolution.
An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding <paramref name="xPathExpression" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> Использует метод <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> методом устранения <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> ссылкой на объект, оценивается выражение.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder" />.
A .NET Framework format string to apply to the result.
A set of prefix and namespace mappings used for namespace resolution.

Uses the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.XPath(System.String,System.String,System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver)" /> method of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page" /> control that the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageTheme" /> class is associated with to evaluate an XPath data-binding expression.
A string that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> Использует метод <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> методом устранения <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> ссылкой на объект, оценивается выражение.

trans-unit.source: Provides run-time data binding against XML-based data in a theme skin file and returns a node collection that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface.
The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder" />.
Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression and returns a node collection that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> list of nodes.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPathSelect%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPathSelect%2A> Использует метод <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> методом устранения <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> ссылкой на объект, оценивается выражение.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder" />.
A set of prefix and namespace mappings used to for namespace resolution.

Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression using the specified prefix and namespace mappings for namespace resolution and returns a node collection that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> list of nodes.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPathSelect%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPathSelect%2A> Использует метод <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> методом устранения <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> ссылкой на объект, оценивается выражение.
